analysis.key_quote: I urge policymakers to reject this dangerous proposal. The NIH must remain an apolitical steward of scientific progress, guided by experts and governed by the principles of meritocracy and peer review.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule to reclassify NIH directors as political appointees, emphasizing the importance of maintaining a merit-based, apolitical system for scientific integrity and research quality.
